text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Plzeň Region | native_name = Plzeňský kraj | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = Fountian in Main Square Plzen.jpg | image_caption = Fountain in the Main Square of Plzeň | image_flag = Flag of Plzen Region.svg | flag_size = | image_shield = Plzen Region CoA CZ.svg | shield_size = | image_map = Plzenský kraj in Czech Republic.svg | mapsize = | map_alt = | map_caption = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Czech Republic | seat_type = Capital | seat = Plzeň | parts_type = Districts | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 7561 | elevation_m = | elevation_max_m = 1370 | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 584672 | population_as_of = 2019-01-01 | population_density_km2 = auto | iso_code = CZ-PL | registration_plate = P | website = www.kr-plzensky.cz }} Plzeň Region is a region in the Czech Republic. The capital city is Plzeň. The southern part of the region has the drainage basin for the Otava River. The northern part, especially around Plzeň, is more industrial. ==Administrative divisions== The Plzeň Region is divided into 7 districts (): ==References== Category:2001 establishments in Europe Category:Bohemia
